snippet.title: Unusual Findings - Official Kickstarter Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Indie studio Epic Llama invites you to party like it’s 1987, and dive into the demo for Unusual Findings, the upcoming point-and-click adventure game. Join a trio of teenagers - Vinny, Nick and Tony - on a journey into mystery and danger, 8-bit gaming, alien conspiracies and VHS rental stores. 

Try the Unusual Findings demo today on Steam and wishlist the game — https://store.steampowered.com/app/1605320/Unusual_Findings/

Check out the Kickstarter here when it launches on Tuesday, October 5th. While nearing the end of development for PC, Epic Llama aim to use Kickstarter funding to bring Unusual Findings to other platforms, including Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series S/X and PlayStation 4/5. Additional stretch goals will allow them to expand the scope of the game across all systems, including new scenes, mini-games and more.
